alert.note: Alert for Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:35AM CDT until April 05 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM CDT FOR RANKIN...NORTHERN SMITH AND SCOTT COUNTIES... At 635 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Farmhaven to near Whites, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Ludlow around 640 AM CDT. Cato and Johns around 655 AM CDT. White Oak around 705 AM CDT. Burns around 715 AM CDT. Pineville around 725 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Polkville, Lake, Sebastopol and Puckett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for central and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
